original_text: But because the Jews objected, I was compelled to appeal to Caesar—though I had no charge to bring against my nation.
korean_text: 유대인들이 반대하기로 내가 마지 못하여 가이사에게 상소함이요 내 민족을 고발하려는 것이 아니니라

sentences.original_text: I was compelled to appeal to Caesar
though I had no charge to bring against my nation.
sentences.korean_translation: 내 민족을 고발할 아무런 죄목도 없었지만
